about.title: I craft stories with data without losing the human side.
paragraphs: I'm Sofi, an Informatics Engineering student (UBA) focused on [strong]data analytics[/strong]. I'm driven by curiosity, clear design, and collaboration. I want every delivery to resonate with real people and deliver measurable value.
